Asụsụ Dakoid bụ alaka nke asụsụ Northern Bantoid a na-asụ na steeti Taraba na Adamawa nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa.

Greenberg debere Samba Daka (Daka) n'ime atụmatụ Adamawa ya, dị ka otu G3, mana Bennett (1983) gosipụtara na afọ ojuju zuru oke na ọ bụ asụsụ Benuezongo, ọ bụ ezie na a na-arụ ụka banyere ọnọdụ ya n'ime Benuez Congo
Blench (2010) weere ya dị ka Benueño Congo
Otú ọ dị, Boyd (ms), na-ewere Daka dị ka alaka dịpụrụ adịpụ n'ime Niger Congo (Blench 2008).
Dong (Donga), ọ bụ ezie na o doro anya Niger-Congo, siri ike ịnye nhazi
Enweghị data e bipụtara na Gaa (Tiba), na Taram (nke Ethnologue depụtara dị ka olumba nke Daka) ka a maara naanị site na data anakọtara na 1931 (Blench 2008).
N'okpuru ebe a bụ ndepụta nke aha asụsụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, na ebe sitere na Blench (2019).
